name: NSO 2 Olympiad
description: National Science Olympiad (NSO) preparation package  NSO for Class 2 students (Age 7 to 10)  * Take six full fledged Olympiad NSO mock exams  * Instantaneous results provided with detail reports. * Fun way to learn and prepare for Olympiad competitive exams * Questions answers are prepared with skilled professionals  * Quiz presented in an appealing user interface * Any number of re-tests can be taken with this application  Key subject include Science, Analytical, Logical and some Maths questions.  Suitable for Class 2 students of all syllabus.   We take extreme care in composing our materials.
